Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes environmental standards for public authorities
Summary: Establishes environmental standards for public authorities.
LawCode: Add Art 9 Title 13 §§2990 - 2999, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing environmental standards for public authorities
